name: Dungeon Adventure
description:
Dungeon Adventure is a pixel-style Adventure game developed by a personal developer. In this game, you can form a team of 4 to 6 people to explore the
According to these combinations reasonably set up their own team, let each member of the division of labor is clear, some is responsible for attack, some is responsible for taunting defense, some is responsible for supporting, some is responsible for control, each performing his own duties and balanced development.

While exploring the dungeons, the player encounters a variety of contingencies that have different consequences depending on the weather, terrain, good and evil values, and the composition of the team that the player is in that day.

When encountering enemies in a dungeon adventure, the right team composition will greatly increase the chance of winning the battle,



After winning the battle, you can use loot to strengthen your team, and you can also use these items to enchant and craft your team.

Finally a complete crusade against the dungeons.
